p: This substitution was associated with CHIKV-WH circulating in Haiti during 2014-2015 [ 69]. In a report describing arboviral infections in school-age children, the major symptoms seen were fever, arthralgia, and myalgia [ 73]. Rash was observed in only 4% of patients [ 73]. As with other substitutions discussed, the alanine to valine substitution reflect non-polar aliphatic to non-polar aliphatic and should not cause any major changes to the protein structure.
